-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game		|Key..................: Included
Platform.............: Windows   	|INIHack..............: Included
Crack................: Included		|
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sid Meier's Alpha Centauri (sometimes abbreviated to SMAC or Alpha Centauri) is 
a 4X turn-based strategic computer game created by Brian Reynolds and Sid Meier 
under the auspices of Firaxis Games in 1999. It is based on a fictional attempt 
by human beings to colonize a planet in the Alpha Centauri star system. It 
picks up where Meier and Reynolds' earlier titles, Civilization I and 
Civilization II, left off. An expansion pack called Sid Meier's Alien Crossfire 
(aka SMACX or just SMAX) was also released. Although popular with gamers, the 
game never reached the heights of success of the Civilization games.

This is a new Release of Alpha Centauri and its expansion, Alien Crossfire. 
While the original release and many other releases did contain all the necessary 
files for a clean install of Alpha Centari and its expansion, they were flawed 
by critical Vista installation and playability problems, stability issues, 
audio-video problems, and poor documentation. By converting the content to a 
portable format, providing better working cracks and better documentation, and 
including the Official patches, these issues have been resolved. It is also 
noteworthy that this release has had all corporate logo files removed.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Miscellaneous Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Note The Following:

.I.
The Federation takes no responsibility for any damage that may come to your 
computer through the trial of this game. This mod has been tested to work 
on Windows XP and Vista. No support or technical assistance will be provided. 
Ever. Creation of this release took ten hours of unpaid labour. 
.II.
To all the Fans, Friends, Foes, Members and Affiliates, of the FEDERATION:

			-----------------------
			|THANKS FOR EVERYTHING| 
                        -----------------------

Because of you we are "STILL UNDERGROUND" and "STILL ALIVE".
[54686f73652057686f204b6e6f772055732043616e2046696e64205573]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps:

(1.) Extract the "Alpha Centauri - Alien Crossfire.rar" file to a 
directory of your choice and then Navigate to the extracted directory (by 
default this is the "Alpha Centauri - Alien Crossfire" directory). 
(2.) Double-click on the desired binary/executable.

Note: This release is portable and therefore the binaries/executables within 
make no changes to the game/system files which are already updated, modded, 
and cracked.

Executable Information:

"ALPHA CENTAURI - HIGH RESOLUTION"    - Multiplayer/Singleplayer Alpha Centauri
"ALPHA CENTAURI - LOW RESOLUTION"     - Multiplayer/Singleplayer Alpha Centauri

Notes:

Extra content, including game convers, are located in the ".Extras" directory.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  In The Pipeline
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
T-BOX - ZKZ of the Federation Team

Games - Pending
EMUs  - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Test  - Complete

This release is imminent. This project seeks to combine a Lite (less than 700m)
Vista build, bootscreen, frontend, registry tweaks, several related 
applications, twenty-plus emulators and tens of thousands of various game 
images and ROMS in an orderly package. This package would then allow a user 
to easily create a SF personal computer (or any other light PC) that would 
act as any console from the first to sixth generation. This has been a huge
undertaking but if it is successful this project will provide the PC scene with 
the first real replacement for consoles. Please understand that projects like 
this one can have unsuspected kinks. Please be patient.

FarCry Co-op - BHD UPDATE*

Game  - Complete
Crack - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Complete
Test  - Complete - Loads of Fun

This update will include the Black Hawk Down Assault Co-op mini mod made 
for FarCry. It will be released when time can be found for basic testing and 
the writing of a beginer-friendly NFO.

Quake 4 Ultimate Co-op - Opencoop

Game  - Pending
Crack - Pending
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Pending
Test  - Pending

As many of you know opencoop recently released a tech demo of their next project 
Quake 4 Co-op which allows you to traverse most of the levels, with large amounts 
of lag, glitches, and crashes. Once they have a clean version working, this 
mod will be released. Because we are waiting for them to finish their work there 
is no release date.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  Known Problems
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(1.) False Positive - The users anti-virus client may detect this programs as a 
Virus or Trojan. This false positive is caused by the binary wrapped scripts 
which are utilized as launchers for the games. As these files create hidden 
functionality they appear as threatening to the overzealous virus scanner eSafe.
Detailed scans have/will indicate that this release neither accesses key system 
files or the internet. There is no way for these files to harm your computer.
